cast.original_title: The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes
cast.overview: 64 years before he becomes the tyrannical president of Panem, Coriolanus Snow sees a chance for a change in fortunes when he mentors Lucy Gray Baird, the female tribute from District 12.
cast.title: The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes

details.biography: Berrecloth is a Japanese / British actor who was first introduced to theatre and performance by actor Bernadette Stewart. In 2016, he became a company member of the National Youth Theatre of Great Britain. Now, having graduated the University of Manchester in the summer of 2023, he is set to appear in the Hunger Games prequel 'Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes' (Lionsgate) alongside actors Peter Dinklage and Rachel Zegler. Berrecloth is passionate about the fight for representation of the ESEA community both in front of and behind the camera.
details.name: Hiroki Berrecloth
